flawed_nl_solution:
This year, Kyle was only able to pick 12/2 = <<12/2=6>>6 roses.
He wants to give his mother 12 x 2 = <<12*2=24>>24 roses.
He still needs another 24 - 6 = <<24-6=81>>81 roses.
He would have to spend 81 x 3 = $<<81*3=243>>243.
#### 243

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
